definition: to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order

sentences.english: The Console should indicate that both subscribers received a copy of the message.
sentences.chinese: 控制檯應該指示兩個訂戶均收到了該消息的複本。

sentences.english: Your job will be to make up the customer's orders.
sentences.chinese: 你的工作就是按訂戶的訂單配齊貨物。

sentences.english: Create another Activation Specification for the nondurable subscriber.
sentences.chinese: 爲非持久訂戶創建另一個激活規範。

sentences.english: The billing system associates invoice records to subscriber accounts.
sentences.chinese: 計費系統將發票記錄與訂戶帳戶關聯起來。

sentences.english: This is one of your newspaper subscribers.
Either Subscriber or CUHK may terminate this Agreement with or without cause at any time and effective immediately.
sentences.chinese: 訂戶或中大任何一方可不論因由隨時終止本協議。

sentences.english: The percentage of subscribers with Internet-ready handsets will quadruple over the next year.
sentences.chinese: 在明年，擁有可上網手機訂戶的百分比將會翻兩番。

sentences.english: Dependents of a deceased subscriber are excluded from their counts.
sentences.chinese: 已故的訂戶撫養的家庭成員會從統計中排除。

sentences.english: The subscriber still can use the software till the day before next payment date.
sentences.chinese: 訂戶仍然可以使用軟體至原訂下次租用付費日前一日。

sentences.english: Removing the application disconnects the subscribers.
sentences.chinese: 刪除應用程序將會斷開訂戶的連接。

sentences.english: A single topic can have both durable and non-durable subscribers.
sentences.chinese: 單個主題可以同時擁有持久訂戶和非持久訂戶。

sentences.english: A single topic can have both durable and non-durable subscribers.
sentences.chinese: 單個主題可以同時擁有持久訂戶和非持久訂戶。

sentences.english: Subscribers then receive an email alert.
sentences.chinese: 然後訂戶會收到一份電子郵件警報。

sentences.english: He is responsible for canvassing the village for subscriptions to the evening paper.
sentences.chinese: 他負責這個村徵求晚報的訂戶。

sentences.english: But the service will be subscription-only from 2007.
sentences.chinese: 但是這項服務從2007年開始將只對訂戶開放。

definition: (computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
to claim a credit against/tax reduction
